<html><body><div><div class="" data-article-body="true"><p class="mb-4 text-lg md:leading-8 break-words">At least 20 Palestinians, including several children and a paramedic, have been killed and almost 40 others wounded in Israeli strikes in Gaza, hospitals say.</p><p class="mb-4 text-lg md:leading-8 break-words">The Israeli military said tanks and aircraft carried out "precise strikes" against what it called "terrorists" who opened fire on troops in the north of the strip, seriously wounding an officer.</p><p class="mb-4 text-lg md:leading-8 break-words">It added that the attack happened close to the Yellow Line, beyond which Israeli forces are stationed in Gaza, and that it constituted a "blatant violation" of the three-month-old ceasefire deal with Hamas.</p><p class="mb-4 text-lg md:leading-8 break-words">Hamas accused Israel of using the shooting as "a flimsy pretext to justify the continuation of killing and aggression against our people".</p><p class="mb-4 text-lg md:leading-8 break-words">Al-Shifa hospital in Gaza City said it had received the bodies of 13 people, including five children, who were killed when tents for displaced families and homes in the eastern Zeitoun and Tuffah neighbourhoods were hit.</p><p class="mb-4 text-lg md:leading-8 break-words">Among the mourners gathered in the hospital's courtyard for funeral prayers was Abu Mohammed Haboush, who said his family was asleep in their home when it was shelled.</p><p class="mb-4 text-lg md:leading-8 break-words">"Our children were martyred - my son was martyred, my brother's son and daughter were martyred," he told Reuters news agency.</p><p class="mb-4 text-lg md:leading-8 break-words">"We have nothing to do with anything, we are peaceful people."</p><p class="mb-4 text-lg md:leading-8 break-words">Nasser hospital in the city of Khan Younis said four dead, including one child, were brought there following strikes on tents in the southern Qizan Rashwan area.</p><p class="mb-4 text-lg md:leading-8 break-words">Another two children, sisters Rahaf and Remas Abu Jamea, and paramedic Hussein al-Samiri were later killed in the coastal al-Mawasi area west of Khan Younis, hospital officials said.</p><p class="mb-4 text-lg md:leading-8 break-words">A first responder from the Hamas-run Civil Defence agency, Jihad al-Hinnawi, told Reuters that the paramedic had rushed to help victims of a strike on a tent in the coastal al-Mawasi area and was then killed by a second strike on the same location.</p><figure class="relative mb-4"><figcaption class="relative text-sm mt-1 pr-2.5"><p>Two children and a paramedic were reportedly killed in two strikes on a tent camp in al-Mawasi [Reuters]</p></figcaption></figure><p class="mb-4 text-lg md:leading-8 break-words">The Palestinian Red Crescent said separately that Samiri was killed "while carrying out his humanitarian duty in Khan Younis". It also accused the Israeli military of a "grave violation" of international humanitarian law, which protects medical personnel.</p><p class="mb-4 text-lg md:leading-8 break-words">When asked to comment, an Israeli military source confirmed that strikes were conducted in Gaza on Wednesday in response to the shooting of the Israeli officer.</p><div class="mb-4"><div class="mb-4" id="recirc-a51512a7-0844-3769-92bc-4d74dbab3926"><div class="grid gap-4 lg:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-rows-[auto_auto_1fr]"><div class="relative flex lg:flex-col lg:row-span-3"><div><div class="flex w-full class="truncate whitespace-nowrap text-battleship label-m-regular dark:text-bob">Popular Science</span></div></div></div></div><div class="relative flex lg:border-b lg:pb-4 lg:border-b-[#e3e3e3] dark:border-b-ramones"><div><div class="flex w-full flex-row items-center truncate"><div class="flex flex-row items-center truncate"><img alt="" loading="lazy" decoding="async" data-nimg="1" class="mr-1.5 inline size-5 rounded-full" src="https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/VaDWhwxj33uNl0I5hHsBog--~B/Zmk9ZmlsbDtoPTQwO3B5b2ZmPTA7cT0xMDA7dz00MDthcHBpZD15dGFjaHlvbg--/https://s.yimg.com/os/creatr-uploaded-images/2025-10/81733030-b418-11f0-b85f-5b53e8d6979b.cf.webp"><span class="truncate whitespace-nowrap text-battleship label-m-regular dark:text-bob">Cleveland.com</span></div></div></div></div><div class="relative hidden md:flex"><div><div class="flex w-full flex-row items-center truncate"><div class="flex flex-row items-center truncate"><img alt="" loading="lazy" decoding="async" data-nimg="1" class="mr-1.5 inline size-5 rounded-full" src="https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/W.BkDda1yzk40x8eAaNsFA--~B/Zmk9ZmlsbDtoPTQwO3B5b2ZmPTA7cT0xMDA7dz00MDthcHBpZD15dGFjaHlvbg--/https://s.yimg.com/os/creatr-uploaded-images/2024-01/54520a30-c429-11ee-aa3b-e213162bfc58.cf.webp"><span class="truncate whitespace-nowrap text-battleship label-m-regular dark:text-bob">TheStreet</span></div><span class="flex flex-row items-center whitespace-nowrap text-battleship label-m-regular dark:text-[#b0b0b0] before:mx-1.5 before:content-['/'] before:text-battleship dark:before:text-bob "><svg aria-hidden="false" aria-label="Comments" class="mr-1" focusable="false" viewbox="0 0 16 16" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill="currentColor" d="M7 2.6a4.4 4.4 0 0 0 0 8.8h2a4.4 4.4 0 1 0 0-8.8zM1 7a6 6 0 0 1 6-6h2a6 6 0 0 1 0 12H7.688c-.877.657-1.989 1.483-2.688 2v-2.341A6 6 0 0 1 1 7"></path></svg>70</span></div></div></div></div></div></div><p class="mb-4 text-lg md:leading-8 break-words">Both Israel and Hamas have accused each other of near-daily violations since the ceasefire took effect on 10 October.</p><p class="mb-4 text-lg md:leading-8 break-words">On Sunday, more than 30 people were killed in Israeli strikes across Gaza. Israel's military said it launched those strikes after gunmen emerged from a tunnel in the southern Rafah area, beyond the Yellow Line.</p><p class="mb-4 text-lg md:leading-8 break-words">Gaza's Hamas-run health ministry has said at least 556 people have been killed by Israeli fire, while the Israeli military has said four of its soldiers have been killed in Palestinian attacks.</p><p class="mb-4 text-lg md:leading-8 break-words">The war was triggered by the Hamas-led attack on southern Israel on 7 October 2023, in which about 1,200 people were killed and 251 others were taken hostage.</p><p class="mb-4 text-lg md:leading-8 break-words">Israel responded to the attack by launching a military campaign in Gaza, during which more than 71,820 people have been killed, according to the territory's health ministry.</p></div></div></body></html>
